1.content:
Your girlfriends Mom Frau just bought a new laptop but isnt sure how to set it up. Since neither Marie or Frau are technically inclined they decide to call you over and have you install the software. Marie opens the front door and you see shes as lovely as ever. You hug and kiss her before she takes you over to the laptop sitting on the coffee table.

"I need to use the bathroom i'll be right back." Marie says and leaves you by yourself. As you wait for the programs to install, you suddenly notice a bunch of error boxes popping up on the screen.

"Thats unusual." You said and hit a few shortcut keys. The system doesnt respond. You grunt and try it again. Just then the screen starts to grow extremely bright and you immediatly realize something is wrong! But before you can do something about it, the light expands outside of the screen and the laptop begins to make weird winding noises. You take a few steps back and are about to turn around, when a beam shoots out from the screen and zaps you square in the chest, knocking you back and causing you to pass out!

You are awakened by heavy foot step like noises, you open your eyes and see that you are still in Marie's home. But something isnt right. The foot steps grow heavier and louder and you immediatly get back to your feet. What you see next is shocking! Your girlfriend Marie walks back into living room and notices you apparently have just left.

"Huh.....wonder where he went? That jerk. Well at least the computer works." Marie said as she grabs the laptop and walks out of the living room, almost crushing you beneath her enourmous black flip-flop!

You are in total shock at whats going on now. You've obviously shrunk and are probably the size of a raisin! You spend a few seconds trying to get yourself together and accept the horrible fact that this is not some crazy dream. You also realize standing around in the open isnt such a good idea either. You could either try and find help in the house, or head out the rear sliding door leading to the backyard and have a better chance of avoiding being stepped on! Making a choice you,
1.title: Shrinking at Marie's house

You look around and think postive, when will you ever get a chance like this again? You should eexplore your gf's house at this size, plus you could also find some help, which would be a good thing. So you begin to walk away from the coffee table, leaving the magic laptop there, running....

Anyways, you make your way to the hallway, where you see plenty of doors. You had been here hundreds of times, but being this size made everything look titanic. You looked around in awe, like as if you were on a tour of a factory or meusem or something.

Just as your reaching the first open door, you heard footsteps, you turn and see.....

12.content:
You decide to head towards the backyard, it might be safer out there. You start running towards the door. On the way there, Marie's sister Emily suddenly runs past you. She almost crushes you, scaring you a lot. After a long time, you finally reach the mighty door. The sliding door was made of glass, so you could see outside. Both Marie and her mother were outside and it looked like they were using their grill. However, as of right now, you had to figure out how to get past the door.

As if Marie could sense your distress, she opened the door and walked in. Just before she closed it, you quickly got through it. You went over to Frau and jumped onto her barefoot. You were going to climb up, however, you were interrupted by Marie's voice. You looked over to see her coming back with something in her hand.

"I'm back, and I have the hot-dogs." Marie said. She handed them to her mother and went over to the table in the grass.

"Say, how long do you think it'll be before your boyfriend gets done?" Frau asked.

"He's done, I think he just headed home."

"Oh, too bad. I'm sure he would have liked to eat lunch with us." Frau went back to heating up the hotdogs. It was a little awkward to look up though because from your perspective, you could see her panties. You had little choice though, so you started to climb her.

"You know what I am going to do to you? I am going to EAT you tiny man!" Frau bellows, her hot breath blowing over you like what fells like a hurricane storm! You shake your head, eyes wide open in fear. You didn't want to believe what you just heard but its true. Your own girlfriends mother is going to eat you!

"You see, where I grew up in my country, bugs are a delicacy. You are just a bug now hehehe!" Frau said as she playfully dangled you in a back and forth motion in front of her eyes. You nearly pass out at first but manage to stay conscious enough to speak,

"Frau no please this is all some big misunderstanding! I didnt shrink myself intentionally so I could try and spy on you and your girls, It was a complete accident and now I need your help so I can get restored back to my normal size!" You try to make it more clear to her, but Frau doesn't seem to be interested in hearing your story now!

"I am sorry tiny man, but as a mother I must protect my family from unwanted intruders. Besides that, I am in the mood for a quick snack before I make dinner." Frau tells you. Either she really is just making up excuses to get you out of Marie's life forever, or shes just a little hard at hearing you especially at your current size. Frau licks her lips and fixes her hungry gaze upon you. Thats when you realize you are running out of time!

info.brief_description: You shrink and are at the mercy of your GF and her family!
info.description:
You are a twenty four year old hispanic guy named Daniel. You have black hair, brown eyes and an athletic body. You work as a computer technician and have a pretty steady life until you shrink to a mere 1.5cm in height right in your girlfriend Marie's house! Marie and her family are Filipino and proud. Marie also has no father because he passed away over five years ago due to cancer. Will you be able to survive your now Giantess girlfriend and her family?



The Family,


Marie - Your girlfriend. Just turned 22 years old. About 5'3" in height. HUGE breasts and nice butt. Gorgeous dark skin and long dark hair. Loves to party hard on the weekends and can out drink you and your friends. Despite her rowdy lifestyle she is a good person and helps her mom as much as possible. She also volunteers to teach children at a church youth group.

Frau - Marie's mom. A bit older at 52 years of age. Fairly tall at about 5'7".Thin but not frail. Her face has some wrinkles due to age and being exposed to a lot of sun thru-out her life but not too bad. Despite her age shes a pretty cool person and you'd still consider her attractive for her age.

Emily - Marie's little sister. 8 years old. Cute as a button but her feet are really stinky sometimes because she always wears her tennis shoes sockless. She also likes to crush ants and even eat them.



Other Characters,


Tanya - Frau's maid. 32 year old. Bronze Skin. Black hair. 5'5" tall and has a nice figure. She also has big feet. Size 10 womens.

Now for the rules. Not many! No male giants of course. Avoid intense sexual encounters if possible. You are not immune to digestion or being crushed. You can die so be careful! Also try to stay consistent with the storyline. For example if Marie is wearing flip-flops in one chapter dont suddenly have her wear boots in the following chapter. That aside have fun and make this story great!
